attributes.action: Name all murderers regardless of age.
attributes.additional_details: Children and young adults feel protected when committing horrendous crimes. They never feel the full shame of their chosen actions.
attributes.background: All murderers to be publicly named and remove their 'Right' to be protected just because of their age. Members of the public have their right to know who has killed someone and who is capable of horrendous crimes and actions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action:  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714967
